text: * Josh Fraser-McGurk, who was a sensation in the Indian Premier League, has struggled in his last 10 T20 innings, including a tough spell in Major League cricket in the US, only scoring 97 runs.

* The article mentions that AJ Tye, a cricketer who plays for the Perth Scorchers in the BBL, was part of the Washington Freedom side that won the USA's Major League Cricket title in July.
* In the Major League Cricket final, Tye took 2-12 in the victory over San Francisco Unicorns.

Note that the article doesn't provide any additional information about the Major League Cricket tournament beyond Tye's involvement and his performance in the final.

* Lance Morris was scheduled to feature for the Seattle Orcas in Major League Cricket (MLC) but missed the tournament due to a back injury.
* Morris's injury, which was initially unclear, was later diagnosed as a "hot spot" in his back, similar to a stress fracture.
* Despite the setback, Morris is focusing on his rehabilitation and has maintained his fitness, which he sees as a silver lining.

That's the relevant information about the Major League Cricket tournament mentioned in the article!
